content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be quite comfortable and ideally located. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime piece of real estate in the heart of the city?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a price of 400 Euros per month would be fair.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I'm looking for a higher offer. The location and quality of the apartment are exceptional, and I believe a price closer to 600 Euros per month would be more appropriate. What do you think about that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I think 500 Euros per month would be more reasonable. The apartment is not furnished, and I would need to spend money on furniture. Additionally, I am a student, so I have a limited budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry to hear that, but as a landlord, I have expenses to cover as well. The demand for apartments in the city center is high, and I'm confident that the value of the apartment justifies a higher price. How about we meet in the middle at 550 Euros per month? This is a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 550 Euros per month sounds more reasonable. However, I think 525 Euros per month would be more acceptable for me. I appreciate your understanding about my budget as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that you find 550 Euros per month more reasonable. As a landlord, I'm willing to work with you to find a price that is fair for both parties. Since you've mentioned your student status and budget constraints, I'll agree to 525 Euros per month. This is a fair compromise that reflects the value of the apartment while taking into account your situation. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [525] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm delighted to have reached an agreement. The apartment will be yours at 525 Euros per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease, and we'll finalize the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
